name: Ability, Ability, Ability (V)
Lore: '''Ben. . . Ben, please! Ben. . . Leia! Hear me, Leia!''',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  You may not play Imperial Barrier.  Senators are deploy +2.  Whenever you initiate a battle, may retrieve your topmost non-[Permanent Weapon], non-[Maintenance] character.  May place the top card of your Reserve Deck in Lost Pile to place a combat card in owner''s Lost Pile. (Immune to Alter.)',
